name: Split Up?
description:
CONTROLS - Shift to split into two or combine into one, arrow keys to control the combined spacecraft, and both arrow keys and wasd to control both spacecrafts.

In this game, you control a spacecraft that can split into two, making time move slowly, whereas together they are bigger and slower, but you only have to control one object.

All the art, music, and sound goes to a lovely man called pixel-boy. Here is the asset bundle I used, https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/space-shooter-1-5280/, which is completely free, and here is his itch.io page, https://pixel-boy.itch.io/ .
